summary.span: 组织 ASP.NET 移动控件的样式特征。

span.span: Organizes style characteristics of an ASP.NET mobile control.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基类包含共有的所有移动控件的样式特性。The base class contains style characteristics common to all mobile controls. 继承自的类类包含特定于其关联控件的其他样式特征。Classes that inherit from the class contain additional style characteristics specific to their associated control. 由于由移动控件支持的设备的多样性，所有样式属性参考性的并且可能或可能不会生效根据目标设备的功能。Due to the diversity of devices supported by mobile controls, all style properties are advisory, and might or might not be honored depending on the capabilities of the target device. ## Examples 下面的示例演示中的三个用户定义样式对象。The following example demonstrates three user-defined styles in a object. A对象包含三个值对应于三个定义的样式。A object holds three values that correspond to the three defined styles. `OnClick`命令事件调用`SelectStyle`函数，这会更改属性对象。The `OnClick` command event calls the `SelectStyle` function, which changes the property of the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileStyleSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileStyleSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileStyleSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileStyleSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

permission.span: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

The specified background color for the style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与其他属性，不同不从其父文件夹继承属性。Unlike the other properties, the property is not inherited from its parent. 例如，如果你设置青色父控件，子控件的属性将不会继承青色背景色; 您必须显式设置子控件的`BackColor`到青色，或者让你的属性必须设置属性控件的父级，并将样式表应用于子控件。For example, if you set the property to cyan on a parent control, a child control will not inherit a background color of cyan; you must explicitly set the child control's `BackColor` property to cyan, or you must set the property of the parent control and apply the style sheet to the child control. 这是与级联样式表的行为一致。This is consistent with the behavior of cascading style sheets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性在不同的颜色中显示文本。You can use the property to display text in different colors. 可以使用的颜色的字符串是一组固定的颜色和十六进制 RGB 值。The strings that can be used for colors are a set of fixed colors and hexadecimal RGB values. 此外可以为"#bb7023"指定这些值。These values can also be specified as "#bb7023". 你还可以使用 Microsoft Windows 颜色常量。You can also use the Microsoft Windows color constants.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要被视为模板化，对象必须具有[\<设备特定 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b)具有元素``元素已成功进行计算的目标设备。To be considered templated, an object must have a [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) element with a `` element successfully evaluated for the target device. 所选的选择必须具有定义的模板。The selected choice must have templates defined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构使用，但不可在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用只能从继承的样式类。Called only from inherited style classes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法注册的字符串属性，支持继承，其默认值为空字符串 ("")。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to register a string property that supports inheritance and whose default value is an empty string (""). 此不完整的示例包括一个公共的属性，其实现使用的基类的默认索引器属性访问此属性的元素。This incomplete example includes a public property, whose implementation accesses an element of this property by using the default indexer property of the base class. [!code-csharp[MobileStyleSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileStyleSample/cs/Default2.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[MobileStyleSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileStyleSample/vb/Default2.aspx#2)]

span.span: A reference to the style properties for a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性必须为属性对象。The value of the property must be the property of a object. 你可以使用属性通过使用继承或通过控件，在通过共享样式样式表的属性。You can use the property to share styles across controls, either by using inheritance or by using the property of a style sheet. 有关详细信息，请参阅[样式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ba186999-7707-426b-9376-7eed6970e7b1)和[创建新样式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/da7f9825-3cc7-4c0f-9800-7d3cb15041d1)。For more information, see [Styles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ba186999-7707-426b-9376-7eed6970e7b1) and [Creating New Styles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/da7f9825-3cc7-4c0f-9800-7d3cb15041d1).

span.span: An enumerated value that specifies the wrapping mode for the style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表包含的定义枚举。The following table contains the definitions of the enumerations. |枚举Enumeration|“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------|-----------------| ||00|没有大小设置为指定的对象。No size is set for the specified object. 这是默认值。This is the default value.| ||11|换到下一行。Wrap to the next line.| ||22|在文本不换到下一行。The text is not wrapped to the next line.|
